title: Pumpkin Breakfast Casserole
instructions: Spray 9x13" baking dish with cooking spray. Place bread cubes into the dish. In a bowl, mix pumpkin, sugar, cinnamon, ginger, nutmeg, vanilla, salt, eggs, milk, evaporated milk & pecans. Pour pumpkin mixture over bread. Cover with plastic wrap & refrigerate overnight. Preheat oven 350°. Uncover & bake casserole until mixture is set & toothpick comes out clean, about 45 min.
